cool .. I've downloaded it, tested and works fine. But I wonder, is there any workaround for activation?
I tried Windows.7.Loader.v2.0.0-Daz but this is not supported ..

Hi guys,
First of all thanx for this upload...I have problem whit this installation. I use WMvare virtual machine to install and test this server, whit 40 GB virtual disk, but when i try to install the windows i get this error in the log file:

Error: Specified partition size is too large to support a data partition, max. possible is : 30619 MB 
UIBackend:: Launch : Exited (0x80004005)
Failed to launch Windows Setup

Any idea what is the problem...mb im :)
